## AuthContainer.signupWithUsername() method

signupWithUsername is a shorthand of [the signup() method](./web.authcontainer.signup.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
signupWithUsername(username: string, password: string, options?: {
        metadata?: JSONObject;
    }): Promise<User>;
```
